## Highlights

- Runtime fixes and instrumentation updates included in this release.
- See merged PRs and commit list in the auto-generated notes below.

## Binaries

- `lunet-linux-amd64.tar.gz`
- `lunet-macos.tar.gz`
- `lunet-windows-amd64.zip`

## Quick Start

```bash
tar -xzf lunet-linux-amd64.tar.gz
./lunet-run path/to/app.lua
```
